name: Word Cross Connect
description:
With over 700 crossword puzzles to complete there will never be a dull moment when playing. Get the incredibly addicting brain puzzle game today for free & solve all the puzzles you can!

• Stimulate your mind & enhance your cognitive abilities
• The game begins easy & then gets much harder
• Learn new words while playing & feel a sense of accomplishment
• Relax, Keep calm & solve puzzles!
